Performer:
Yoshida Seizaburō (see also Toyomatsu Seizaburō) (吉田清三郎)

Alternate Name: Toyomatsu Seizaburō (豊松清三郎)

Dates: '1986/11-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Puppeteer:

January 1987: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

February 1987: The Love Suicides at Amijima

April 1987: The Tycoon's Exploit

June 1987 Harajuku Bunraku: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

August 1987: The Disinherited Son

November 1987: The Two-Colored Reins
